lines: Tell me, have you ever had any luck at the Gold Saucer? You've never even been, you say? Well, in that case, I'll try searching elsewhere for someone who understands the profound depth of my suffering.
In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete one of the following main scenario quests: “The Gridanian Envoy,” “The Ul'dahn Envoy,” or “The Lominsan Envoy.”

Word has it there are some famous folk from all across Eorzea enjoying the festivities at the Saucer right now. Mayhap you'll bump into them next time you find yourself there; gods know the Spinner's smiled on you in lieu of me thus far.

obj.n: Les jolis petits lots du Gold Saucer
Bottes de travail en cuir de sanglier
